data.lyric:
[ti:Envy Me (Explicit)]
[ar:Calboy]
[al:Envy Me (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Envy Me (Explicit) - Calboy
[00:00.23]Lyrics by：Calvin Woods
[00:00.47]Composed by：Calvin Woods
[00:00.70]Now I lay me down to sleep
[00:02.32]Now I lay me down to sleep
[00:03.93]I pray the Lord my soul to keep
[00:05.62]I pray the Lord my soul to keep
[00:07.19]Like a locksmith I got the keys
[00:08.76]Like a locksmith I got the keys
[00:10.33]Pull up make opp n***as bleed
[00:12.12]Pull up make opp n***as bleed
[00:13.68]I got water like overseas
[00:15.27]I got water like overseas
[00:16.93]B***h I ball like NBA
[00:18.50]B***h I ball like NBA
[00:20.11]B***h I ball like MVP's
[00:21.95]B***h I ball like MVP's
[00:23.37]I got money they envy me
[00:24.90]I got money they envy me
[00:26.06]I'm with the gang I'm with the mob what was you thinkin'
[00:29.38]Remember them days and that s**t was hard a n***a been thinkin'
[00:32.53]I put a four in a twenty ounce a n***a been drinkin' yeah
[00:35.62]If you with the squad I give you my heart lil' n***a I mean it
[00:38.59]I was fighting some demons in the field b***h I'm deep in
[00:42.15]I was raised in the deep end I know n***as be sinking
[00:45.05]Take your b***h and go deep in but I gave her back why you tweakin'
[00:48.59]Come around with that rah-rah we leave you dead on the cement
[00:51.87]With the gang we ain't playing fair
[00:53.66]Matter fact we don't play at all
[00:55.31]OG 'woods in the air
[00:56.27]But we bought the runtz so we smoke it all
[00:58.18]Putting on a front boy you better fall
[00:59.79]We gon' kill 'em dead we gon' kill 'em all
[01:01.44]Might spend a ten when I'm in the mall
[01:03.10]I was on the bend with it in my drawers
[01:04.53]Hit that smoke and I'm blackin'
[01:06.24]Hit that smoke and I black out
[01:07.83]If he run blow his back down
[01:09.36]I was gone but I'm back now
[01:10.95]These n***as gon' fold but I never back down
[01:14.34]In the school I was trappin'
[01:15.80]In the school you was class clown
[01:17.77]Ayy now I lay me down to sleep
[01:21.08]I pray the Lord my soul to keep yeah ayy
[01:24.57]Like a locksmith I got the keys yeah ayy
[01:27.76]Pull up make opp n***as bleed yeah ayy
[01:31.01]I got water like overseas yeah ayy
[01:34.02]B***h I ball like NBA yeah ayy
[01:37.24]B***h I ball like MVP's yeah ayy
[01:40.74]I got money they envy me
data.trans:
[ti:Envy Me (Explicit)]
[ar:Calboy]
[al:Envy Me (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.23]//
[00:00.46]//
[00:00.70]现在我准备躺下睡觉
[00:02.32]现在我准备躺下睡觉
[00:03.93]我向上帝祈祷 希望能保持真我
[00:05.62]我向上帝祈祷 希望能保持真我
[00:07.19]我得到了成功的密匙 
[00:08.76]我得到了成功的密匙 
[00:10.33]停留在此 把通敌的小子打得满地找牙
[00:12.12]停留在此 把通敌的小子打得满地找牙
[00:13.68]我的钻石都是进口货
[00:15.27]我的钻石都是进口货
[00:16.93]我花天酒地 生活潇洒
[00:18.50]我花天酒地 生活潇洒
[00:20.11]我挥金如土 尽情享受
[00:21.95]我挥金如土 尽情享受
[00:23.37]我富甲一方 他们都嫉妒我
[00:24.90]我富甲一方 他们都嫉妒我
[00:26.06]我跟帮派的兄弟混 还有一群暴民 你在想什么
[00:29.38]记得那个时候 我们的生活都不容易 我一直在想
[00:32.53]20盎司的汽水里加了4克料 我一直喝这个
[00:35.62]只要你加入我们的团队 我肯定真心对你 小子 我说真的
[00:38.59]我一直在和我的心魔作斗争 我被纠缠住了
[00:42.15]我也是在底层社会长大的 我知道有些人永远爬不起来
[00:45.05]抢了你的女人 和她深入交流 你急什么
[00:48.59]带着枪到处招摇 一枪就让你倒地
[00:51.87]有帮派撑腰 我们很难公平对决
[00:53.66]事实上 我们从来不开玩笑
[00:55.31]空气里有Backwoods**的味道
[00:56.27]但我们买了Runtz 可以尽情享受一番
[00:58.18]装模作样 小子 你还是赶紧跑吧
[00:59.79]我们一个也不会放过
[01:01.44]每次去到商场 都要花个几万块
[01:03.10]我的身体和心灵都在狂欢
[01:04.53]抽一口烟 我想要大喊
[01:06.24]抽一口烟 我就断片了
[01:07.83]要是他敢跑 把他打趴下
[01:09.36]之前我消失了 现在我又回来了
[01:10.95]很多人对我点头哈腰 但我绝不屈服
[01:14.34]在学校里 我就开始**
[01:15.80]在学校里 你是班上的小丑
[01:17.77]现在我准备躺下睡觉
[01:21.08]我向上帝祈祷 希望能保持真我
[01:24.57]我得到了成功的密匙 
[01:27.76]停留在此 把通敌的小子打得满地找牙
[01:31.01]我的钻石都是进口货
[01:34.02]我花天酒地 生活潇洒
[01:37.24]我挥金如土 尽情享受
[01:40.74]我富甲一方 他们都嫉妒我
